name: Miss.Snake
description:
This is a twist on the classic snake game, and a throwback to the ridiculous idea that a minor change suddenly makes a game for girls instead of boys. In this game you play as Miss Snake, you can tell because her head is pink! So, ludicrous.

Miss Snake is a reptile with a fixation on color. She likes to eat the same color that she wears. You can eat any color first, but once you do, Miss Snake will change her tail color. After that, you need to eat the same color as her tail, or you will lose score. On the left, it shows what color Miss Snake is planning to wear next. Don't hit a wall and don't hit yourself!

As always, love to hear feedback and thank you for playing!

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys to switch direction.
